t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Exploring Amazon’s Own-Brand and Private Label Business
s: February 8, 2023 - Reports from late 2019 show Amazon ... Amazon exclusive brands currently operating in every Amazon locale, except Amazon Netherlands, Amazon Brazil, and Amazon Turkey. One of Amazon’s most popular and lucrative brands is the private label Pinzon, which began selling textiles and household goods in August 2005 on Amazon.com. AmazonBasics, Amazon’s first in-house brand launched in 2009 selling a range of home goods ...

t: Amazon will sell an exclusive brand of home health products called Choice, made by Arcadia Group
s: October 26, 2018 - Arcadia Group created a new brand of medical products called Choice exclusively for Amazon. So far, the company is offering glucose and blood pressure monitors, and more products may be on the way.

t: What is Amazon Exclusives? How Can You Succeed With This Program? - Empire Flippers
s: June 17, 2021 - Amazon Exclusives is a program that allows you to sell unique products on the Amazon platform while still being able to sell through your own e-commerce store outside of Amazon. Amazon will also promote your products for you and, if you join FBA, they will fulfil orders for you, too.
